title: Client Performance
body:
Hey guys!

I don't know about you, but League's client performance/stability is somewhat not optimal in my opinion. Though it can be very much a thing that can be contributed to my toaster, it could also be this simple fact: The client is just bad.

What I am talking about is the unsually long patch time for patches that are 30MB or so big. Why does it take 10 to 15min. just to apply a patch of this small size? My buddies with quite up-to-date rigs also need alot of time for these tiny little updates. 
Other performance issues occur in champ select. I guess I am not the only one experiencing lags when pressing certain buttons, selecting champs and locking them in.

In game performance is on fleek, but the client needs real improvements. For a game that has such a big audience and has been out there for a decade, it is about time to give more love to the client, don't you think?

What do you think?

replies.body: I agree completely with you. We are not happy with the current state of things.

Hi Riot a huevo,

Do you have any intentions of bettering the client then? 

A lot of time has passed since the creation of this thread but I haven't noticed any real advances on the issue.

I've had this issue for months now, made a board on it and didn't get a reply. The client is taking 70-93% of my physical memory (still as of today)... For some reason, the actual game takes way less memory than the client? Guess we're all in the same boat huh?
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Got pretty serious about league (teams n stuff). Bought myself a laptop with gtx 1050 + 7th gen core i7 Game was unplayable. Unreal framedrops - couldnt lock in a champ due to lag in client. So i had to buy a pc with gtx 1080 + i7 8086k just so league can run somewhat smoothly and i STILL get framedrops!!!!  When i first got it (2-3 months ago) game ran on 600 fps. Right now im happy if it can reach stable 300. Cause most of the time it CANT.  And the riot support said that it was an issue with my PC and not league itself xD

Exactly that is what happened to me! My frames have dropped massively, I can barely lock in a champion on the client due to lag and people kept telling me it was a computer issue. Let's just hope it's finally going to get fixed once and for all :)
Yeah, we had a nasty bug that dropped champ select performance significantly. It is fixed in 9.8.

Client patching i find the worst. It's pretty bad when i can download/install a 80GB+ game faster than it takes for league download/install its patches every 2 weeks. It's honestly awful and im not the only one this happens to in my friend group.
